text: Different Fortunes () is a 1956 Soviet drama film directed by Leonid Lukov.Фильм об Александре Матросове покажут в киноклубе псковской библиотекиКинофильму «Разные судьбы»– 60 == Plot == The film tells about young residents of Leningrad, finishing school. Sonia loves Stepu, who is in love with Tanya, and Tanya likes Fedor. Stepa goes to Siberia to study at the evening institute and work in parallel at the local plant. Sonia goes for Stepa and joins the team of the plant where he works. Tanya and Fedor got married and entered the institute, and Fedor, in addition, got a job as a chauffeur in order to bring money to the family. But this was not enough for Tanya, and for the sake of money she began a relationship with a self- sufficient composer.Разные судьбы == Cast == * Tatyana PiletskayaТАТЬЯНА ПИЛЕЦКАЯ ПРАЗДНУЕТ 90-ЛЕТИЕАктриса Татьяна Пилецкая празднует 90-летний юбилей as Tanya Ogneva * Yulian Panich as Fedya Morozov * Georgiy Yumatov * Lev Sverdlin * Olga Zhizneva * Sergei Blinnikov * Vladimir Dorofeyev * Sergey Filippov * Bruno Frejndlikh * Anna Kolomijtseva * Tatyana Konyukhova * Muza Krepkogorskaya * Lilia Maksimova as Masha == References == == External links == * Category:1956 films Category:Russian-language films Category:Soviet films
title: Different Fortunes
